import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { AiOutlineArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/ai' import { createProductReview, listProductsDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const [rating, setRating] = useState(0) const [comment, setComment] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading, product, error } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductsDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch]) const addToCart = () => { setQuantity(1) history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${quantity}`) } const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() dispatch( createProductReview(match.params.id, { rating, comment }) ) } return ( <> {' '} GoBack {loading && } {product && ( <>

{product.name}

 ;

rating

 Price: ₹ {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ₹ {product.price} status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'inStock' : 'Out of stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( QTY setQuantity(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map(x => ( ))} )}

reviews

{product.reviews.length === 0 &&

reviews

} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
